events.title: I.M (MONSTA X) presents Off The Beat World Tour 2024
events.location: Los Angeles, California, United States Of America
events.description: All Ages Welcome. Every person must have a ticket to attend the event, regardless of age. Doors: 7:00 p.m. Show: 8:00 p.m. *All times and supporting acts are subject to change The following bag policy is in place: Bags up to 12" x 6" x 12" are allowed in the venue. All bags will be searched prior to entry. Bags that are not clear will be subject to additional search.
